name: Cute Attacks
description:
Cute Attacks is a Shoot’em up, a subgenre of electronic shooting games where the character evolve engages in a solitary attack, shooting at various enemies and avoiding their attacks. 

Cute Attacks is an adventure about cowboy Theodoro, the last serious human being in the world. All the humans have been seduced by unicorns that throw rainbows and kawaii items. Now, Theodoro must fight this evil of humanity
